blogPost.excerpt: Todayist helps busy folks fit what matters most into their day. Prioritize your goals, tasks, and most importantly: YOURSELF. Stay inspired with bite-sized activities tailored to you. Download on iOS and Android to live your life with purpose.💚
blogPost.body: Todayist helps busy folks fit what matters most into their day. Prioritize your goals, tasks, and most importantly: YOURSELF. Stay inspired with bite-sized activities tailored to you. Download on iOS and Android to live your life with purpose.💚
blogPost.title: Todayist - Your friendly planning tool to make the most of every day
blogPost.author: Jessica Devine

localize.description: Todayist 帮助忙碌的人们将最重要的事情融入到他们的一天。优先考虑你的目标，任务，以及最重要的。你自己。通过为你量身定制的小活动来保持灵感。在iOS和Android上下载，让你的生活更有目标.💚。
localize.tagline: 您的友好计划工具，让您的每一天都能得到充分的利用。

localize.description: Todayist 幫助忙碌的人們將最重要的事情融入到他們的一天。優先考慮你的目標，任務，以及最重要的。你自己。通過爲你量身定製的小活動來保持靈感。在iOS和Android上下載，讓你的生活更有目標.💚。
localize.tagline: 您的友好計劃工具，讓您的每一天都能得到充分的利用。

previous.excerpt: Vantage is a cloud cost transparency platform currently supporting AWS. Securely link your AWS account in a click of a button and we'll automatically show you where your costs are coming from and how they're trending.
previous.title: Vantage - A cloud cost transparency platform

localize.description: Vantage是一个云成本透明平台，目前支持AWS。只需点击一个按钮，就能安全地链接你的AWS账户，我们会自动向你展示你的成本来自哪里，以及成本的趋势。
Vantage是一個雲成本透明平臺，目前支持AWS。只需點擊一個按鈕，就能安全地鏈接你的AWS賬戶，我們會自動向你展示你的成本來自哪裏，以及成本的趨勢。

next.excerpt: Alpaca offers the world’s first commission-free fractional trading API to allow us to build more flexible quant trading models and fintech apps.
next.title: Alpaca Fractional Trading API - Commission-free API to trade & invest for as little as $1

localize.description: Alpaca提供了全球首个免佣金的零碎交易API，让我们可以建立更灵活的量化交易模型和金融科技应用。
localize.tagline: 免佣金的API，交易和投资的价格仅为1美元
